Received: from JP3884@... by imo-r20.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v26.7.) id a.24.45e1800 (4595) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Sun, 30 Apr 2000 19:31:09 -0400 (EDT)

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

::: Within the walls of the Arc, MEGATRON ducks his head. He was being 
attacked on all sides by numerous enemies :::

::: MEGATRON ::: Ah, so...this is the way to must be? Very well....

::: He transforms into his flight mode and shoots straight upward to one of 
the rafters of the Arc, now clear of the opening. He looked down at himself 
to see that he was almost ripped to peices....and that GREMLIN, JACKLE, and 
BLACK ARACNIA had scattered through out the ship...:::

::: MEGATRON ::: Damn....I must get rid of the Auto-bots...but Im being over 
whealed. 

::: He raises his comm link ::: Shredder, Anix, Quickstrike, Rat trap, and my 
other followers...come, the moment of justice has arrived!

::: Now that he called for reinforcements, it would take more stress off his 
mission. Looking to the right, he squeezed his massive body into a quite 
large vent, and began to scurry to the bridge ::::

~~~~~~~~~

::: HELL BEAST fell face first onto the ground. He was shot at from all 
sides, as if it were " pick on HELL BEAST day "......:::

::: With half of his face plate missing, he looked up to see MEGATRON force 
his way into the Arc ::: Damn him....hes going to try and destroy the 
Autobots.....

::: PHENIOX swooped over head giving him cover ::: Sir, what are we to do?

::: HELL BEAST ::: ah, seeing as how GREMLIN, BLACK ARACNIA, and JACKLE are 
within the Arc, we can sit out here and pick off Maximals while they destroy 
the Arc....with Megatron in it hopefully.
